info.description: API to create and update arrangement product related details
info.title: Management of holdings Products

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

propertyId.description: The identifier of the property, being an instances of a property class, e.g. Interest is property class and Debit Interest is property

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

accountName.description: The name of the account that is displayed

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

accountName.description: The name of the account that is displayed

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

billType.description: This signifies the type of the bill generated

propertyId.description: The identifier of the property, being an instances of a property class, e.g. Interest is property class and Debit Interest is property

endDate.description: The date an agreement or contract ceases - the opposite of start date

consentTypes.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

accountIBANs.description: Indicates the consent type provided for a particular account. For example, If consent sub type for account 100100 is given as allPsd2, the account is given global consent.

accountIBAN.description: Represents the International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the account.  E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

isConsentGiven.description: Indicates whether the customer consents to adding this account to the TPP (third party provider) service they are signing up for or otherwise.

accountBlock.description: Indicates whether the consent account has been blocked or not. Holds YES/NO/Blank.

blockFrom.description: Specifies the date on which account consent is blocked.

blockTill.description: Specifies until which date account consent to be blocked.

blockNotes.description: Reason for blocking the account in the consent.

consentSubType.description: Indicates the consent type provided for a particular account. For example, If consent sub type for account 100100 is given as allPsd2, the account is given global consent.

consentStatuses.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

consentStatus.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

lastActionDate.description: Indicates the date on which the status of the consent arrangement changed.

thirdpartyproviderId.description: Unique TPP(third party provider) reference which is the global urn of the TPP. For example: PSDLU-CSSF-9db9074bf3be45550237a21cd2a11585

signUpService.description: Indicates whether the signing up information is to be AISP(Accounts information service provider) or PISP(Payments information service provider).

recurringIndicator.description: Indicates whether the expiry date to be recalculated for every duration of expiry period.

frequencyPerDay.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application executes the payment instruction

combinedServiceIndicator.description: Specifies whether the payment initiation service will be addressed in the same session as account information consent request

scaStatus.description: Contains the status of the strong customer authentication process for the payment or consent. Valid values are received, psuIdentified, scaMethodSelected, started, finalised or failed

link.description: Contains the arrangement activity reference of the parent. This is used during secondary activity processing where child activities are generated at runtime during processing.

thirdpartyprovider.description: Contains the TPP (third party provider) name or text of the TPP reference

externalUserId.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created.

onlineArrangement.description: Contains the arrangement identifier of the external user that contains the rights that the external user has access to.

term.description: The period to which the rate applies

updateLimit.description: Decision field, if the limits to be booked or not at the time of issuing the pre-advise LC

consentTypes.description: Conset Type for which the consent is given.The pre-defined consent types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

consentType.description: Conset Type for which the consent is given.The pre-defined consent types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

consentSubType.description: Consent types may have sub-types under it which may require explicit consent from the customer.These sub-types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

status.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

propertyId.description: The identifier of the property, being an instances of a property class, e.g. Interest is property class and Debit Interest is property

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

parseTime.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.
